name: @uvidswqkscr89/leiga_mcp_smithery
description: Manage Leiga projects and issues from your workspace. Search across projects with flexible filters, view detailed issue info, and create new issues with priorities, statuses, and sprints. Retrieve your assigned tasks and list available projects to stay organized.

tools.name: search_all_issues
tools.title: Search All Issues
tools.description: Searches Leiga issues using flexible criteria. Supports filtering by any combination of: title text, project name, status(2=ToDo, 3=In Progress, 4=Done), assignee, label, priority name, work type, start date range, due date range, and create date range. Returns up to 10 issues by default (configurable via pageSize).

query.description: Optional text to search in title

workType.description: Filter by issue work type name

dueAfterDate.description: Filter issues that are due AFTER or ON this date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

dueBeforeDate.description: Filter issues that are due BEFORE or ON this date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

startAfterDate.description: Filter issues that start AFTER or ON this date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

startBeforeDate.description: Filter issues that start BEFORE or ON this date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

createdAfterDate.description: Filter issues that were created AFTER or ON this date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

createdBeforeDate.description: Filter issues that were created BEFORE or ON this date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

tools.name: get_issue_detail
tools.title: Get Issue Detail
tools.description: Get issue detail by using issue ID or issue number.

tools.name: my_assigned_issues
tools.title: My Assigned Issues
tools.description: Retrieves my issues, specifically those assigned to the authenticated user. This tool is activated only when first-person singular pronouns (e.g., me, my, mine, or myself) are explicitly used in the query.

query.description: Optional text to search in title

pageSize.description: Maximum number of issues to return (default: 10)

workType.description: Filter by issue work type name

dueAfterDate.description: Filter issues that are due AFTER or ON this date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

dueBeforeDate.description: Filter issues that are due BEFORE or ON this date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

startAfterDate.description: Filter issues that start AFTER or ON this date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

startBeforeDate.description: Filter issues that start BEFORE or ON this date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

createdAfterDate.description: Filter issues that were created AFTER or ON this date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

createdBeforeDate.description: Filter issues that were created BEFORE or ON this date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

tools.name: create_issue
tools.title: Create Issue
tools.description: Creates a new Leiga issue. Required fields: summary (issue title) and projectName. Optional fields: description (issue details), priority (0-4, where 0 is no priority and 1 is urgent), statusName (issue status, e.g., 'Not Started', 'In Progress', 'Done'), sprint (sprint name), and workType (e.g., 'Story', 'Chore', 'Bug'). Returns the created issue's identifier and URL.

tools.name: list_issue_comments
tools.title: List Issue Comments
tools.description: List comments of an issue by ID or issue number with pagination.

issueId.description: Issue ID or issue number (e.g., 12345 or ABC-678)

tools.name: create_comment
tools.title: Create Comment
tools.description: Create a comment for an issue. Can be a new comment or a reply to an existing comment.

issueId.description: Issue ID or issue number (e.g., 12345 or ABC-678)

commentId.description: Optional: Comment ID to reply to (for replies)

tools.name: list_project_members
tools.title: List Project Members
tools.description: List members of a specific project with optional search and pagination.

keyword.description: Optional keyword to search for members

tools.name: list_org_members
tools.title: List Organization Members
tools.description: List all organization members with optional search and pagination.

key.description: Optional keyword to search for members

tools.name: get_issue_options
tools.title: Get Issue Options
tools.description: Get selectable option fields for an issue by ID or issue number.

issueId.description: Issue ID or issue number (e.g., 12345 or ABC-678)

tools.name: update_issue
tools.title: Update Issue
tools.description: Update an issue by ID or issue number. If names are provided for fields (e.g., statusName, priorityName, assigneeName, labels), they will be resolved to IDs via get_issue_options before updating.

dueDate.description: Due date (YYYY-MM-DD) or timestamp in ms (optional)

issueId.description: Issue ID or issue number (e.g., 12345 or ABC-678)

startDate.description: Start date (YYYY-MM-DD) or timestamp in ms (optional)
